special_attacks: +1 on attack rolls against goblinoid and orc humanoids
gear: leather armor, heavy mace, miner's pick, pitons (10), rope (50 ft.), 753 gp

sections.body: During Combat The commoner uses whatever materials are available to avoid melee combat, such as a lantern he can smash to create a fire.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: A miner labors long hours in the dark, and spends his earnings freely during rare visits to the surface.

defensive_abilities: defensive training (+4 dodge bonus to AC vs. giants)
name: Miner
skills: Appraise +3 (+5 to assess nonmagical metals or gemstones), Climb +5, Knowledge (dungeoneering) +0, Perception +5 (+7 to notice unusual stonework), Profession (miner) +9
will: +2; +2 vs. poison, spells, and spell-like abilities
